entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
